machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G92 E0           ; zero extruder
G1 E-2.0000 F2000 ; retract filament
M104 S0           ; extruder off
M140 S0           ; bed off
M107              ; fan off
G90               ; absolute coords
G28 X0            ; home X
M18 S0            ; disable steppers

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G21 ; use mms
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ; heat bed
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ; heat extruder
G90 ; abs coords
M82 ; abs extruder
M107 ; fan off
G28 Z ; home Z
G1 Z10 F1200 ; lift nozzle
G28 X Y ; home XY
G92 E0 ; zero extruder
G1 X230 Y50 F9600 ; move nozzle to priming location
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ; wait for bed
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ; wait for nozzle
G1 E10 Z0.3 F225 ; prime and lower nozzle
G1 X190 Z0.1 F1200 ; wipe nozzle
G92 E0 ; zero extruder
